title: Augusta County: John D. Imboden to Annie Lockett, November 17, 1870
summary: Imboden writes to his fiancee to express his eagerness to marry her and tease her about how her acquaintances react to the news that she is engaged to an older man. He also describes some of the experiences he and his daughters were having in New York.
keywords: Military Authority, Women, Family, Arts/Leisure, American Civil War
